choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
For libreoffice calc write an expression to copy contents from another cell and remove all single quotes

### Response:

To copy the content of one cell in LibreOffice Calc without any single quote, you can use this formula: =TRIM(SUBSTITUTE(A1,"'","")) where A1 is the cell reference that contains the text to be copied. This expression will remove all occurrences of single quotes from the selected cell and return only its contents.
